AzureBlade stumbles in a room where a strong looking robot stands talking 
with someone else over the comms. It seems they are talking about some 
remains or something.

AzureBlade:
Sorry to interrupt this conversation. I am AzureBlade and I wish to join the 
maximals. I shall leave if you wish to keep this confidential...

>::Hot Rod::
>
>He nodded listening to Windlord. They had reached the city.
>"She should still be training." He headed to the training area where he
>had last seen IR.
>"Iron Raptor? You here?"
>
>::Epyon::
>
>"Leave the remains Alpha. In case of an emergancy we will have a place
>to fall back too, and build from."
>
>::DrillBit::
>
>He changed course and headed for Blackfortress.
